Active Development

I, along with the developers of the GoXLR-Utility, are working hard to add even more functionalities to the app, in order to have one day a fully working GoXLR on a Unix machine.

100% SwiftUI

The app was written in Swift using mostly SwiftUI. This allows the app to be even more integrated within the OS, and more optimised.

MenuBar-based

Your GoXLR settings are always one click away. No bothering dock icon, just a little icon on your menubar, allowing you to adjust settings on the go.

Profile Seamless Handling

No need to bother with the profile files, just import your profiles from your Windows PC, and double click them in Finder, they will automatically load.
